verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> 'When you come into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> (this is the land <S%H776><s%> that shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> even the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> according to its borders <S%H1367><s%>),

then your south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> shall be from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> along by the side <S%H3027><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> and your south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> shall be from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> eastward; <S%H6924><s%>

and your border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn <S%H5437><s%> about southward <S%H5045><s%> of the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H4610><s%> and pass along <S%H5674><s%> to Zin; <S%H6790><s%> and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be southward <S%H5045><s%> of Kadesh Barnea; <S%H6947><s%> and it shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> to Hazar Addar, <S%H2692><s%> and pass along <S%H5674><s%> to Azmon; <S%H6111><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn about <S%H5437><s%> from Azmon <S%H6111><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
<S%H3220><s%>"'For the western border, <S%H1366><s%> you shall have the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> and its border: <S%H1366><s%> this shall be your west <S%H3220><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>
<S%H6828><s%>"'This shall be your north border: <S%H1366><s%> from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> you shall mark out <S%H8376><s%> for you Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor; <S%H2023><s%>

from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> you shall mark out <S%H8376><s%> to the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be at Zedad; <S%H6657><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> to Ziphron, <S%H2202><s%> and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at Hazar Enan: <S%H2704><s%> this shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>
<S%H184><s%>"'You shall mark out your east <S%H6924><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> from Hazar Enan <S%H2704><s%> to Shepham; <S%H8221><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> from Shepham <S%H8221><s%> to Riblah, <S%H7247><s%> on the east side <S%H6924><s%> of Ain; <S%H5871><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go down, <S%H3381><s%> and shall reach <S%H4229><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> eastward; <S%H6924><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> to the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be at the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%> This shall be your land <S%H776><s%> according to its borders <S%H1367><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is the land <S%H776><s%> which you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> by lot, <S%H1486><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe; <S%H4294><s%>

for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7206><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> and the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1425><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> have received, <S%H3947><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have received, <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>

the two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H4294><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%> eastward, <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrise. <S%H4217><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> who shall divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to you for inheritance: <S%H499><s%> Eleazar the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
You shall take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of every tribe, <S%H4294><s%> to divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>
These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men: <S%H582><s%> Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh. <S%H3312><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Shemuel <S%H8050><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Elidad <S%H449><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chislon. <S%H3692><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Bukki <S%H1231><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jogli. <S%H3020><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Hanniel <S%H2592><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ephod. <S%H641><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphtan. <S%H8204><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parnach. <S%H6535><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Paltiel <S%H6409><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzan. <S%H5821><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Ahihud <S%H282><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomi. <S%H8015><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> a prince, <S%H5387><s%> Pedahel <S%H6300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>"

These are they whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to divide the inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
